description.message: Download links on a web page with popular downloaders such as FlashGet (www.flashget.com) and Thunder (www.xunlei.com).

disableMenu.message: Disable right-click download menu and use default Chrome context menu

tipNolink.message: There are no links on this page

tipUnable.message: This is a special page. Unable to use Download Helper on this page.

noDownloader.message: You haven't install any downloader. Please install FlashGet or Thunder, and refresh the page.
